roleset.name: know or understand by a gut feeling

example.name: intuit-v
example.text: In plumbing the monk 's essence she intuited that some of his ideas were nonsense , but he was a sincere believer in Christe and in the things he said .

propbank.arg: that some of his ideas were nonsense , but he was a sincere believer in Christe and in the things he said

example.name: intuition-n: both args
example.text: Adem can not know , even with his intuition about the created world , how to value Ralph 's ambiguous description of the serpent .

roleset.note: INTUITION-N NOTES: Based on ontonouns. No comparison. Framed by Katie. (from intuition.01-n)
INTUIT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for unification.
